loon.data 0.0.8
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Simple summary of data available in named packages

pkg_data.Rd

Simple summary of data available in named packages

pkg_data(package = NULL)

Arguments

package

A character vector giving the package(s) to look in for data sets, or NULL. By default, all packages in the search path are used, then the ‘data’ subdirectory (if present) of the current working directory.

Details

Syntactic sugar wrapping call to utils::data(package = package) to return basic information on datasets in package. No data are loaded by the call.

See also

data

Examples

pkg_data("loon.data")
#>       Package     Item               
#>  [1,] "loon.data" "SAheart"          
#>  [2,] "loon.data" "SCmolecule"       
#>  [3,] "loon.data" "alaska_forest"    
#>  [4,] "loon.data" "binaryalphadigits"
#>  [5,] "loon.data" "bone"             
#>  [6,] "loon.data" "bone_ext"         
#>  [7,] "loon.data" "digits"           
#>  [8,] "loon.data" "elements"         
#>  [9,] "loon.data" "faces"            
#> [10,] "loon.data" "frey"             
#> [11,] "loon.data" "igg1"             
#> [12,] "loon.data" "lightspeeds"      
#> [13,] "loon.data" "michelson_1879"   
#> [14,] "loon.data" "minority"         
#> [15,] "loon.data" "ordalphadigits"   
#> [16,] "loon.data" "ordfrey"          
#>       Title                                                         
#>  [1,] "South African Heart Disease Data"                            
#>  [2,] "A protein/DNA complex molecule from Saccharomyces Cerevisiae"
#>  [3,] "Cooperative Alaska Forest Inventory data"                    
#>  [4,] "Binary Alphadigits"                                          
#>  [5,] "Relative Spinal Bone Mineral Density Data"                   
#>  [6,] "Spinal Bone Mineral Density (Extended) Data"                 
#>  [7,] "USPS Handwritten Digits"                                     
#>  [8,] "The first 118 chemical elements"                             
#>  [9,] "Olivetti Faces"                                              
#> [10,] "Frey Faces"                                                  
#> [11,] "Human immunoglobulin G1 antibody molecule"                   
#> [12,] "Historical Determinations of the Speed of Light"             
#> [13,] "A.A. Michelson's 1879 Determinations of the Speed of Light"  
#> [14,] "Canadian Visible Minority Data 2006"                         
#> [15,] "Binary Alphadigits Isomap"                                   
#> [16,] "Frey Faces Isomap"
